caption:
The photograph is framed by an archway covered with leafy branches, creating a natural vignette around the scene. Through this arched view, we see a park-like setting with an expansive, neatly manicured grassy area and mature trees in the background. In the middle ground, there is a traditional well or wishing well constructed of stone, around which several people are gathered. The well is at the center of a paved circular area, possibly functioning as a gathering or focal point within the setting.

Three people are visible in close proximity to the well. There is a woman to the left, looking towards the others, and two men on the right, one of whom is interacting with the well, possibly throwing something in or making a wish. The people are dressed in casual attire suitable for a day out in a park â€“ the woman in a white sweater, and the men in light-colored shirts and trousers. One of the men carries a bag, suggesting they may be tourists or visitors to the area. 

The overall composition and atmosphere suggest a tranquil, leisurely day at a public park, with people engaging in casual social activities and enjoying the outdoor environment. The photograph has a slightly faded or vintage quality, adding to the timeless feel of the scene.
title: "wishing well" in the gardens of the canadian school of horticulture, on the niagara parkway north of Niagara Falls ontario
